entity_id.description: The identifier of the subject of the authorization

authority_id.description: The id of the Authority entity

assertion_id.description: The identifier of the claim type being made against the entity_id

assertion_verified.description: True if the assertion has been verified, false otherwise.

time_requested.description: the server time that was requested (may be blank).

time_evaluated.description: the server time that was used in the query.

message.description: additional details attached to the response about the assertion

context.description: the context object that was supplied for the

time.description: Time for query to use. If blank, uses current server time. RFC3339 required, using only Z (+00:00) offset.
